title: Interactive Online CV
one_line_description: Where you are right now! This is the result of my online interactive CV. Like a real CV, it is a perpetual work in progress!
details: This CV page is a static web page that is built from json files so that it can be very quickly editied and added to. I do my best to keep this page as up-to-date as I can, but please reach out to me using the Contact page if you want to get in touch.
